channel.title: My diary of getting to 99 firemaking!
channel.description:
I just recently got 2million and im about to get 99 fire making and this is how ive done
[b]4th November 2007[/b]
- I received 2 million and looked on forums for cheapest sell on willows. - Bought 100k willows for 1.5million and still had 500k left.
[b]5th November 2007[/b]
- Just started firemaking, i was already 65. - Burned about 400 logs and im now level 66. - I lent my friend 300k and he gave me back so now i have 800k.
[b]6th November 2007[/b]
- Bought some more logs - Worked for and hour or 2 - Was level 66 now level 67
[b]7th November 2007[/b]
- Just logged on and burned logs - I burned about 600 logs and now level 68 - Carried on burning now im almost level 69
[b]8th November 2007[/b]
- Just burn a couple of hundred logs - Was level 68 now 69 - Burned about 1k logs - Now level 70
[b]9th November 2007[/b]
- Burned about 1k logs - Now level 71 - Carrying on burning
[b]10th November 2007[/b]
- Burned lots more - Now level 72
Taking a break from this for a week!

item.title: My diary of getting to 99 firemaking!
item.dc:creator: @XharveyX XharveyX
item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

all i need is 50k more, i have the cash to buy but then its the matter of burning.

im getting 2mil soon and ill buy more logs for flecthing

Read full topic

item.title: My diary of getting to 99 firemaking!
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

You will give up, 100,000 logs doesn’t seem lit a lot, but it is.
I attempted willows, and it was too much.

item.title: My diary of getting to 99 firemaking!
item.dc:creator: @XharveyX XharveyX
item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

I just recently got 2million and im about to get 99 fire making and this is how ive done

4th November 2007

  • I received 2 million and looked on forums for cheapest sell on willows.
  • Bought 100k willows for 1.5million and still had 500k left.

5th November 2007

  • Just started firemaking, i was already 65.
  • Burned about 400 logs and im now level 66.
  • I lent my friend 300k and he gave me back so now i have 800k.

6th November 2007

  • Bought some more logs
  • Worked for and hour or 2
  • Was level 66 now level 67

7th November 2007

  • Just logged on and burned logs
  • I burned about 600 logs and now level 68
  • Carried on burning now im almost level 69

8th November 2007

  • Just burn a couple of hundred logs
  • Was level 68 now 69
  • Burned about 1k logs
  • Now level 70

9th November 2007

  • Burned about 1k logs
  • Now level 71
  • Carrying on burning

10th November 2007

  • Burned lots more
  • Now level 72

Taking a break from this for a week!
